title: Ticket #3079: condor_startd loops with async_pipe is signalled, but async_pipe_signa
description:
Observed on a Windows XP machines in new batlab (exec-102) running 7.8.0. Both slots were stuck. This time the StartLog was spammed with entries in this form: "06/21/12 16:08:01 DaemonCore: async_pipe is signalled, but async_pipe_signal is false." Log is entirely spammed, so there is no useful information. Master didn't think the startd was crashed and the startd was advertising. Possibly related to Ticket #3076: Startd slot stuck in Preempting/Vacating, as both of the machine's slots were stuck in Preempting/Vacating.

Logs are temporarily available at puffin:/scratch/adesmet/windows-loop/exec-102.batlab.org-log
creator: adesmet
